{{Conjecture|Presumed title.}}
{{Needs render|Character items, Collection characters}}

[[File:Beyond the Pale Garden key art.jpg|thumb|Key art for the event.]]
From December 4 to December 11, 2024, several releases were made to promote [[The Garden Awakens]] drop, which had released the day before the campaign. These 7 days were known as '''Expect the unexpected''',<ref>{{ytl|x5yzJ7QCYA8|Minecraft: Expect the unexpected|Minecraft|December 6, 2024}}</ref> also known as '''Beyond the Pale Garden''',<ref name=":0">{{Mcnet|beyond-the-pale-garden|Beyond the pale garden|December 4, 2024|Linn Viberg}}</ref> featuring projects such as add-ons, a skin pack, and an [[Event servers|event server]].

Prior to the campaign's official beginning, a cryptic article revealing the Garden Awakens release date set up a narrative of [[Minecraft.net]] writer [[Sophie Austin]] reportedly disappeared into the [[Pale Garden|pale garden]].<ref>{{Mcnet|the-garden-awakens-drop-date|The Garden Awakens|November 27, 2024|Sophie Austin}}</ref><ref name=":0"/> It would be formally announced on [[Minecraft Monthly]].<ref> {{YouTube link|u63KYFsNC44|NEWEST GAME DROP! + LIVE EVENT IN MINECRAFT? {{!}} MINECRAFT MONTHLY|Minecraft|December 4, 2024}}</ref>

== December 4 ==
=== Packs inspired by the pale garden ===

[[File:Beyond the Pale Garden Add-on promo.png|right|frameless]]
{{clear|both|class=mobileonly}}
; {{va|Phantom Frames}}
{{Main|Phantom Frames}}

Phantom Frames is a free add-on developed by [[Hive Games]], available on both {{el|bedrock}} and {{el|java}} (as [[data pack]] and [[resource pack]]).<ref name=":0" /> The add-on features several "magic paintings," which send the player to a random [[biome]] in the world.<ref>{{Citation|url=https://updates.playhive.com/changelog/get-the-free-phantom-frames-add-on-on-the-minecraft|title=Get the free Phantom Frames Add-On on the Minecraft Marketplace!|website=The Hive|date=December 4, 2024}}</ref>

; {{va|Majestic Camping}}
{{Main|Majestic Camping Add-On}}

Majestic Camping is an add-on developed by [[Jordan Maron]], better known as CaptainSparklez, that is centered around various camping supplies, such as hammocks, tents, and flashlights. It was released for {{minecoin|660}}.<ref name=":1">{{cite|title=Ghost Pets Add-On|author=AriaCreations|website=Minecraft Marketplace|url=https://www.minecraft.net/en-us/marketplace/pdp?id=500dbac8-209a-4a55-9643-829fd6f8989f}}</ref>

; {{va|Ghost Pets}}
{{main|Ghost Pets Add-On}}

Ghost Pets is an add-on developed by [https://www.minecraft.net/en-us/creator?name=ariacreations AriaCreations] that allow existing "pet" mobs to become powerful ghosts, with associated features such as glowing dye. It was released for {{minecoin|660}}.<ref name=":1" />

== December 7 ==
[[File:Eerie Mojang Office Party Promo 1.jpeg|thumb|Promo for the event.]]

=== Eerie Mojang Office Party ===
{{Main|Eerie Mojang Office Party}}
Although previously announced on ''Minecraft Monthly'', on December 7th an article was announced formally explaining the '''Eerie Mojang Office Party'''.<ref>{{Mcnet|eerie-mojang-office-party|Join our in-game event|December 7, 2024|Linn Viberg}}</ref> The plot, settings, rewards, and release date of the event were revealed.

== December 10 ==
=== Three startling add-ons ===
After several days without any official updates to the initiative, news would conclude with the announcement of three additional add-ons.<ref>{{Mcnet|three-startling-add-ons|Three startling add-ons|December 10, 2024|Linn Viberg}}</ref>
; {{va|Scary Furniture}}
{{Main|Scary Furniture Add-On}}
Developed by [https://honeyfrost.net/ Honeyfrost], Scary Furniture contains several pieces of unique furniture entities. Several options include mimic chests, haunted bookshelves, chess sets, and a piano. The pack was released for free, with an accompanying pop-up to promote it.{{Citation needed}} Within the context of the narrative framing device, the possessed furniture ended up killing several detectives.
; {{va|Mob Lights Add-On}}
{{Main|Mob Lights Add-On}}
Developed by Horizon Blocks, Mob Light is an add-on adds several lights in the shape of mobs. These each have their own properties and abilities, intended for use defending [[survival]] bases. The add-on was released for {{Minecoin|660}}, and contributed to the meta narrative by helping illuminate a path, with the investors getting distracted by the add-on's cosmetic options.
; {{va|Monster Food Add-On}}
{{Main|Monster Food Add-On}}
Developed by [[Noxcrew]], Monster Food offers several food options themed around monsters, such as [[Warden|wardens]], [[Ravager|ravagers]], and the [[Ender Dragon|ender dragon]]. The add-on was released for {{Minecoin|660}}.

=== Starter Packs ===
{{Expand section}}
Alongside the add-ons, two additional [[content bundles]] were released to coincide with the theme of the event.

; {{va|Weapons Pack}}
The Weapons Pack is a bundle devoted to weapons and tools, including the [https://www.minecraft.net/en-us/marketplace/pdp?id=fcf1e7a7-b669-4753-8485-75ace3c56f97 Mob Weapons] add-on by [[Logdotzip]], two additional add-ons, the Pufferfist character item, and minecoins.

; {{va|Scary Pack}}
The Scary Pack is a bundle devoted to horror tropes, including the [https://www.minecraft.net/en-us/marketplace/pdp?id=f53ebd90-d0ae-412c-b5d9-121f3df40913 Mutant Zombie Dungeons] map, [https://www.minecraft.net/en-us/marketplace/pdp?id=d50bd371-3662-41b2-bce7-dafce66444e7 Mutants] add-on, [https://www.minecraft.net/en-us/marketplace/pdp?id=5d08f3ef-df41-45a7-9fa7-f4d60e0a8340 The Backrooms] map, [https://www.minecraft.net/en-us/marketplace/pdp?id=fc5760e5-ed30-4ffd-b3dc-354e2e7c2a10 Insane Disasters] add-on by [[Spark Universe]], several character items, and minecoins.
[[File:CaseOh & Quackity promo.jpeg|thumb|Promotional image for the promotion.]]

=== Saving Kitty ===
On Twitter, notable ''Minecraft'' {{w|content creator}}s CaseOh and {{w|Quackity}} were announced to be participating in a promotional stream. Announced to begin on December 13th, the stream centers around their quest to rescue CaseOh's [[cat]] Kitty, who had somehow been captured in a cage within a pale garden.<ref>{{tweet|Minecraft|1866519387198398493|For the very first time, @Quackity & @CaseOh__ are teaming up in Minecraft to celebrate The Garden Awakens drop!<br><br>Together, they must save CaseOh's cat, Kitty, from a cage hidden deep within the Pale Garden. Will they get got by the creaking, or will they save kitty?<br><br>Find out December 13th 9:30pm CT / 7:30pm PT|December 10, 2024}}</ref>

== December 11 ==

=== New rewarded achievement ===
Following several days of apparent incidents within the narrative, Sophie was found outside the pale garden, wearing the Heart Transplanter character creator item. The item is unlocked by properly activating a collected creaking heart.<ref>{{Mcnet|new-rewarded-achievement|New rewarded achievement|December 11, 2024|Linn Viberg}}</ref>
